about.title: About Me
about.name: Joni Harju
about.description: As a passionate full-stack developer with 3 years of hands-on experience, I'm on a mission to push the boundaries of web development. My journey in tech is fueled by curiosity and a relentless drive to learn and create innovative solutions.
about.background: With a strong foundation in computer science and 3 years of professional experience, I specialize in building scalable web applications using modern technologies.
about.goals: My goal is to contribute to innovative projects that push the boundaries of what's possible in web development. My goal is to contribute to innovative projects that push the boundaries of what's possible in web development.
about.currentFocus: I'm currently diving deep into advanced state management techniques and serverless architectures. I'm currently diving deep into advanced state management techniques and serverless architectures.

projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive full-stack e-commerce solution that revolutionizes online shopping experiences. The platform integrates real-time inventory tracking, secure payment gateways, and a dynamic recommendation engine to personalize user experiences. Built with scalability in mind, the platform supports thousands of concurrent users and handles large transaction volumes seamlessly. Additionally, a user-friendly admin panel was designed to manage products, orders, and customer interactions with ease. This solution has dramatically increased conversion rates and customer retention, proving to be a highly profitable investment for the client.

testimonial.text: Joni's work on our e-commerce platform was exceptional. He delivered beyond our expectations with an innovative solution that is both robust and easy to manage.
testimonial.author: Jane Smith
testimonial.title: CEO, TechRetail Inc.

projects.title: AI-Powered Content Generator
projects.description: Created an innovative AI-driven tool that transforms content creation for websites and social media. The tool automates the process of generating SEO-friendly and industry-specific content, drastically reducing the time and effort needed for manual content creation. Utilizing machine learning algorithms, it personalizes content for the target audience while maintaining brand voice. The platform also features integrations with major content management systems, allowing for easy deployment and updates. The project included a powerful API that supports real-time content adjustments based on performance metrics, driving both engagement and conversions.

testimonial.text: The AI content generator Joni developed has revolutionized our content creation process. We’ve been able to scale content production while maintaining a high level of quality.
testimonial.author: Mike Johnson
testimonial.title: Content Director, AI Innovations

projects.title: Smart Home IoT Dashboard
projects.description: Engineered a real-time IoT dashboard that provides smart home device users with seamless control and monitoring. The dashboard features data visualization for energy consumption, device status, and real-time alerts for anomalies. Designed with an intuitive UI, the platform integrates with various IoT devices and popular voice assistants for easy control. Users can create custom automations based on device activity or time schedules, enhancing the home automation experience. This project not only improved user engagement but also increased the adoption of smart home technology among novice users.

testimonial.text: Joni's IoT dashboard transformed our smart home ecosystem. It made managing devices so much easier for our users, leading to increased engagement and retention.
testimonial.author: Sarah Lee
testimonial.title: Product Manager, SmartLiving Tech

projects.title: Custom CRM System
projects.description: Developed a fully customized CRM system tailored for small businesses. The platform supports lead tracking, sales automation, and customer service workflows. Features include email integration, automated follow-ups, and detailed reporting dashboards to track team performance and sales funnels. The system also offers customization options for different industries, allowing businesses to tweak the CRM to their specific needs. By automating key processes, the CRM significantly reduced time spent on manual tasks, enabling teams to focus on more strategic initiatives.

testimonial.text: The CRM system Joni built has streamlined our entire sales process. It’s intuitive, easy to use, and customizable, making it the perfect fit for our business.
testimonial.author: David Kim
testimonial.title: CEO, BizGrowth Solutions

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.formTitle: Feel free to reach out to me through any of these platforms.

techStack.name: React
techStack.howUsed: Built dynamic and responsive user interfaces for several web applications. Created reusable components and implemented advanced state management using React hooks and Context API.

techStack.name: Next.js
techStack.howUsed: Developed server-side rendered and statically generated websites for improved performance and SEO. Leveraged API routes and dynamic routing to handle backend functionality.

techStack.name: TypeScript
techStack.howUsed: Implemented static typing for JavaScript applications, reducing runtime errors and improving code maintainability. Created custom types, interfaces, and generics for complex data structures.

techStack.name: JavaScript
techStack.howUsed: Used JavaScript for front-end interactivity and back-end server logic. Built interactive web applications and optimized code performance in both browser and server environments.

techStack.name: HTML
techStack.howUsed: Crafted semantic HTML structures for various websites and web apps, ensuring accessibility and SEO optimization. Collaborated with design teams to turn mockups into clean HTML code.

techStack.name: CSS
techStack.howUsed: Styled web applications using CSS and preprocessors like SASS. Implemented responsive design techniques and animations to enhance user experience across devices.

techStack.name: Tailwind CSS
techStack.howUsed: Utilized utility-first Tailwind CSS for rapid UI development, reducing the need for custom CSS. Built scalable and consistent design systems with responsive layouts.

techStack.name: Firebase
techStack.howUsed: Utilized utility-first Tailwind CSS for rapid UI development, reducing the need for custom CSS. Built scalable and consistent design systems with responsive layouts.

techStack.name: Node.js
techStack.howUsed: Built RESTful APIs and real-time server applications with Node.js and Express. Implemented middleware for authentication, request validation, and error handling.

techStack.name: Sanity.io
techStack.howUsed: Set up a headless CMS with Sanity.io to manage dynamic content for various web applications. Customized content schemas and integrated them with front-end applications via Sanity’s API.

techStack.name: Material-UI
techStack.howUsed: Used Material-UI to build responsive and accessible web applications. Customized components and themes to align with specific branding and design requirements.

techStack.name: Prisma
techStack.howUsed: Utilized Prisma ORM to interact with databases, enabling type-safe database queries. Integrated Prisma with Node.js applications to handle database operations smoothly.
